actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

official_title: To amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to reform payment to States under the Medicaid program.
short_title: Medicaid Accountability and Care Act of 2013
subjects: Department of Health and Human Services

summary.text: Medicaid Accountability and Care Act of 2013 - Amends title XIX (Medicaid) of the Social Security Act (SSA) to revise payments to states under the Medicaid program, including granting an option to receive Medicare payments for full-benefit dual eligible individuals (who are eligible for Medicare benefits under SSA title XVIII as well as Medicaid).

titles.title: Medicaid Accountability and Care Act of 2013
To amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to reform payment to States under the Medicaid program.
